#1

UPC: 5060485803188

Such a great director so few Blu-ray releases!

Nice to see this getting released from https://www.cultfilms.co.uk

Looks like it has the documentary Marco Ferreri: Il regista che venne dal futuro which is a nice bonus. There's a much newer documentary from 2017 I believe I'd like to see in HD.

The Ape Woman | Blu-ray | Free shipping over £20 | HMV Store

Marco Ferreri (Director) | Carlo Ponti (Producer) | Rafael Azcona (Writer) | Marco Ferreri (Writer) The Ape Woman Blu-ray Free shipping over £20

Amazon product ASIN B0974Z3NF5

Other English friendly Blu-rays from Ferreri (do you know of any others?):

Arrow's much appreciated UK/USA release of La Grande Bouffe:

There's also a really nice Spanish release of Ferreri's El Cochecito https://cameo.es/el-cochecito.html

Cult Epics managed to patch together a release of Flesh:

#2

THE APE WOMAN

THE APE WOMAN is the highest-praised film by Marco Ferreri, the over-the-top iconoclastic director known for ‘La Grande Bouffe’.

Picked this up. Has a reversible sleeve.

All disc content plays in A no problem no nasty PAL either.

Picture has certainly been remastered looks fantastic.

The documentary is the same one that's on DVD and YouTube Il Regista Che Venne Dal Futuro disappointing but still good content and that's definitely not been remastered (has non-removable English subtitles) it's a copy & paste job.

Back cover of the standalone documentary that was released on DVD:
